thread.title: Look Beyond Verizon’s Headline Numbers
thread.title_full: Look Beyond Verizon’s Headline Numbers - WSJ

author: Miriam Gottfried
title: Look Beyond Verizon’s Headline Numbers
text:
There is a mysterious phenomenon afoot in the U.S. wireless industry. The competition has never been fiercer, yet the two big incumbents are poised to report record third-quarter wireless margins.
The secret to how Verizon Communications and AT&T are pulling this off lies in the way they account for new plans that separate the cost of a phone from that of service. The carriers book more revenue for devices upfront. That gives... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
